contest-event.event-date: Oct. 5, 1974 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Fantasy for Brass Band [Arnold] Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK The winning band was also presented with a Decca LP recording offer. The winning conductor received a presentation score of the test piece. The Insignia of Honour was presented to Edward Gray.
